caption.p: The probability a strain will emerge given R 1 = Ï‡ R 0 S/ N, as calculated from equation (2.3). Here S/ N = 0.9 and I 0 = 1. The dashed line shows the probability that it will emerge in the absence of any compensatory mutations, as in equation (2.1). A strain with R 1 < 1 will find it much harder to cause an epidemic.
